name: Burger Village
address: 120 Church St, New York, NY 10007, USA

reviews.text: Good sized menu. Clean! Vegan options. Really like this place.
Excellent service, friendly, awesome food !
Food is amazing!
Excellent experience including delicious handmade meals.

Great place, great environment,  great choice of Meat. Got the Elk while the wife got the regular beef. The atmosphere is well lit and inviting. Staff seems very pleasant. Can't wait to grab the bison burger next time! Thanks, see y'all soon!
Really tasty burger and the service just amazing! Diana is the best there!
Organic food ğŸ‘
Very good ğŸ‘ğŸ¼
The people are very nice, the food is great and healthy.
Great burger place. Lamb burger was phenomenal. Fantastic service and a quaint atmosphere. You wouldn't realize you were in New York City if not for the pot smell wafting in at times from the street.
amazing food. great burger combinations. lots of vegetarian options. delicious delicious, I will come back when I'm in the area.
Heerlijke hamburgers, frietjes, bier en milkshakes!
Excellent is all I can say
Great food, great personel and amazing customer care. Would recommend 100% come here if u hae the chance
Sam was so nice an fast
Cibo buonissimo e servizio eccellente, Diana Ã¨ stata super cortese e veloce
Came back again and wasnâ€™t disappointed. Food came out in a timely fashion, my server Abby was great and attentive, and Iâ€™ll definitely be back to try more items on the menu.

Great experience and definitely a place i would recommand. As a belgian i tend to be picky on french fries and beers and let me tell what a great surprise i got. They propose two different french fries (one classic and one seasonned that i loved) and you can definitely tell they are freshly homemade. Shout out to the cooks for daring to propose seasonned french fries cuz it feels good to try something new and innovative ;) they had quite a nice selection of beers too. My girlfriend had a cider cuz she can t have beers with gluten and that one was perfect. I tried the bloody orange pale ale and once again what a pleasing surprise cuz i haven t tasted once as good as this one.
Burgers are really tasty
Really good food, great service!!
Clean nice place. Economic.
Good very good

Sehr nettes Personal toller Service sehr gut erklÃ¤rt

GroÃŸe Auswahl Regionalregion Bio frischgebackene BUNs

Die Burger hier sind einfach fantastisch! Saftiges Fleisch, frische Zutaten und eine perfekt abgestimmte SoÃŸe â€“ man schmeckt die QualitÃ¤t bei jedem Biss. Sehr empfehlenswert!

Ok where do I start?! Idk whatâ€™s better the amazing food or the immaculate service. Elise was very warm and welcoming from the door making the experience even more magical with a bubbly attitude and perfection in her craft. The food was amazing as well, my dad ordered a burger and loaded fries which didnâ€™t survive for pictures lol. I had garlic Parmesan chicken wings and tots and boy when I say the flavor was there omg definitely top 5 in my book. A new fav of ours will be back, definite recommendation to come here if not for food for the comfort.

Ps - Give Elise a raise ğŸ˜

Previous diners have been quite thorough. You'll notice the thoughtful design right away. The staff is pleasant and works efficiently. Burger Village sources products worth using. Visit this place right away.
It was fairly good. But significant overpriced for a couple of burgers and fries to share.
Liked the burger, and nice staff,good for relaxation and a good burger
Everything is  fantastic
The waitress, Diana, was super friendly and very welcoming. The service was fantastic, and the food was delicious.
Great food great service
Dâ€™excellents burgers service trÃ¨s sympa par Dighaa je recommande !
A five-star experience.
Awesome burger... Elk burger was delicious. Staff was excellent.

The food was great. We had Bison and Salmon burgers with fries. Loved the fresh lemonades. But I want to shout out Ana! She was our server and was super sweet and we enjoyed our conversation with her. We were visiting from Georgia and she showed the service and hospitality that was beyond welcoming. She was PERFECT! Wishing you the best Ana!

My appreciation grew with each course they served. The service stood out, our order didn't take long, and all items tasted delicious. The dish had fresh elements but needed more volume. The staff demonstrated both kindness and problem-solving. They've created dining nirvana here.
Had the shredded beef tacos and they were amazing!
Very satisfied with the whole process.

El sÃ¡ndwich de pastrano al estilo NYC muy recomendable.
Diana, nuestra camarera, super amable y atenta.
Excellent burgers.  Places is clean and you can sit to enjoy delicious food.
Great service

The burgers in NYC are absolutely amazing â€“ juicy, fresh, and full of flavor! The atmosphere is very welcoming, and the service is top-notch. I would especially like to highlight Amir, who served us with great professionalism and a warm smile. He truly made our visit outstanding. I highly recommend this place and will definitely come back!
Amazing service, Roshna was attentive and caring. Cant wait to eat here again!
Nothing has been bad, but nothing has been particularly good either. Everything has been average. All in all, it's been the most average, three-star experience in a while.

Burger bun was old on a Monday lunch , most likely left over from the week end. The portions are small, expect the bun that makes it look big and lacks of flavor, meat patty was flat and did not taste meaty.
Una de las mejores hamburguesas!
Tasty and good

Update 9/7/2025- Original review from 2023. No response from management yet- If you are going to advertise a lunch special, then honor it.  I came with my grandchildren and had anticipated $15 Burger, fries, and soda.  A sign outside advertises the special as well as the menu.  When the check comes I get told they don't honor it on a "holiday"
Friendly staff, big portions and tasty food.
That burger was the best gluten-free burger I ever ate. Very clean, very delicious and the atmosphere was also pretty well. Loved it, hope I'll come see this place again.
Sehr zu empfehlen, danke! Alle waren sehr nett zu uns.

I came one time and came back with my wife on her birthday and we had a fabulous time.
I had the Bison burger and my wife had a green bowl salad.
Both meals were scrumptious, prepared well and very tasty.
The staff is exceptional with excellent customer service and whatever they didn't have knowledge in, they found out immediately and answered all of our questions.
They're always smiling and so pleasant.
A definite 5 stars!ğŸ–ğŸ¾
We are coming back for sure!ğŸ¤¸ğŸ¾â€â™‚ï¸

Great spot for some local burgers, sides, other sandwiches and beer! They even had a pastrami sandwich (new on menu), which was really good but perhaps a little heavy on the mustard sauce. All in all a great atmosphere, busy place but with good service. I recommend although not cheap due to location. Good selection of beers and the friendly waitress let us sample some before deciding.

Iâ€™m a professional food critic and this is some of the best food Iâ€™ve ever had definitely come here for whatever occasion. It has the best chicken sandwich ever. Yummy food but kid tenders small. I love the big juicy meat inside the buns love it Anthony. Great customization options, great vegan options for others! Iâ€™ve never salivated so much in my life. Thank you

Wir waren heute spontan am Abend dort essen und wurden, trotz einem fast leeren Restaurant - Super freundlich empfangen. Unser Kellner war sehr aufmerksam, zuvorkommend und hat uns sofort bei der Karte weiter geholfen. Das Essen kam sehr schnell und war hervorragend. Sehr lecker.

Hervorzuheben ist absolut der Service. Auf eine bessere Art, kann man nicht freundlicher sein. Ganz lieben Dank!

Itâ€™s a really cozy and cool place, I liked the atmosphere. The staff are very nice and respectful, and overall they provide good service.

They also have a good variety of beers.
For vegetarians, there are several options available on their menu.

TrÃ¨s bon accueil. Burgers bons ( pas exceptionnels non plus mais originaux).  Sauces bonnes Ã©galement. Frites excellentes !!! Bons cocktails ğŸ¸.  Le happy hour dÃ¨s 15h est trÃ¨s apprÃ©ciÃ©( attention pas le vendredi).  Jâ€™y suis allÃ©e deux fois et je recommande.

Very good burger with some interesting options.
Was sitting there for almost 10 mins without any service until the hostess saved the situation. Service was great once my server showed up. Great team work.

What an amazing spot for a group happy hour, especially as the restaurant is surrounded by overpriced bars in Tribeca. HH runs from Monday to Thursday 3-7pm with specials such as $6 margarita, $5 draft beer and other drink discounts. Our server, Diana, was really friendly and constantly check-in on our group of 11 with prompt services on drinks. We also ordered bunch of appetizers to share - the wings were delicious with unlimited sauces, the waffle fries and cauliflower tenders were fan favorite as well. We also tried the burgers, and they were very juicy and tasty! This is going to be our new favorite spot in Tribeca.

Had the beef burger and was very impressed. Definitely the best burger Iâ€™ve had in a long time. They also had a lot of burgers with meat substitutes. Service was great and the wait for food was only 10 minutes. Would definitely recommend.

The burger was tasty, but for the price we expected a little more. The service was also good, but also there the lady was coming way too oft (at least 5 times while we had food in our mouth) while we were eating asking if everything was okay. Overall good.

Insane amount of burger combinations.  Quick and friendly service. Unfortunately,  there was nothing special about the food. I would say mediocre at best. But reasonably priced in the middle of downtown makes it a good tourist destination after some sightseeingğŸ‘ğŸ¿

Dobre burgery bez miÄ™sa a ceny sÄ… przystÄ™pne. MoÅ¼esz sobie wybraÄ‡ kilka pozycji i doÅ‚oÅ¼yÄ‡ sobie extra dodatki. Pani nas obsÅ‚ugujÄ…ca byÅ‚a bardzo pomocna i przyjazna. NaprawdÄ™ warto tutaj zajÅ›Ä‡ jeÅ›li nie jesz miÄ™sa.
Ps.
Frytki sÄ… ze skÃ³rkÄ… mi smakowaÅ‚y ale nie kaÅ¼dy lubi w szczegÃ³lnoÅ›ci dzieciaki.

Na een museumbezoek waren we opzoek naar een eettent. Op google was deze dichtbij dus why not. Ruime zaak. Het was nog rustig (16uur). De bediening was zeer snel en vriendelijk en legde alles goed uit. Je kan kiezen uit het soort vlees: rund ,lam, buffel, rendier,kalkoen,zalm. En al het vlees is biologisch en zonder antibiotica en hormonen. Daarna kan je de topping kiezen. Wij kozen de california en de my deer. De burger waren groot, medium gebakken op een brioche. Lekker vlees, pure smaak. We hadden ook normale friet en zoete aardappel friet. Dit kwam in een emmer(tje). Niet die mini emmers van Nederland. Je kan makkelijk 1 emmer delen.  De zoete aardappel leek meer aangebrand  en was donker van kleur en minder zoet en luchtig zoals ik het ken. De curry bij de friet was erg lekker. De lemonade en ice tea waren ook lekker. Het was een goede stevige lunch!

Wir haben uns spontan dazu entschieden hier zu essen.
Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen und gleich bedient.
Ich hatte einen Beef Burger und kann ihn bestens empfehlen. Zum Nachtisch hatte ich einen Cheesecake mit SchokoladensoÃŸe und war sehr zufrieden damit .
Die Preise sind vÃ¶llig in Ordnung, das Personal super freundlich und hilfsbereit- daher kann ich     Burger Village mit gutem Gewissen weiterempfehlenâ€¦
Gerne wieder ğŸ‘

ğŸ¥—ğŸ” VEGAN BURGER HEAVEN in Tribeca! ğŸ”ğŸ¥—

Who says finding veggie-friendly spots in the US is tough? ğŸŒ± I just discovered @BurgerVillage in Tribeca, and wowâ€”itâ€™s a game-changer! ğŸ™Œ

âœ¨ Tried their Falafel Veggie Burger and it was absolutely mouthwatering ğŸ¤¤ (10/10 recommend!). They also have Black Bean Burgers + other amazing veggie options that make it super easy for vegetarians/vegans to enjoy a proper burger night. ğŸ’š

The vibe? Chill, cozy, and perfect for hanging out with friends & family. ğŸ¹ Plus, their happy hour drinks are such a stealâ€”you canâ€™t miss it!

The best part? Theyâ€™ve got multiple locations in NYC & across the USA ğŸš€, so youâ€™ll never be too far from your next plant-based burger fix.

Une trÃ¨s belle dÃ©couverte ce soir, Ã  6 minutes du 9/11 memorial.
Burgers, NY cheese cake, vanilla milkshake, biÃ¨re, pour un trÃ¨s bon rapport qualitÃ©-prix.
Produits et service vraiment trÃ¨s bien.
Merci Ã  Amir M. pour ces conseils et sa patience (C'est bien la premiÃ¨re oÃ¹ on me propose de goÃ»ter deux biÃ¨res pour choisir). Le service meriterai 6 Ã©toiles.
Je recommande sans souci.
â¤ï¸ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·

Sehr leckere Burger und Pommes! Ist zu 100% einen Besuch wert. Service sehr sympathisch.
Village Beef mit Brioche Bun und Village Falafel Sandwiche mit Multi-Grain Bun.
Nos encantÃ³ la de bisonte con jalapeÃ±os PICAN PICAN pero los puedes quitar. Karen fue super amable. De las mejores hamburguesas de NY

10/10 recommend!!! You must try the falafel & waffle fries ğŸ¤ŒğŸ»ğŸ¤ŒğŸ»ğŸ¤ŒğŸ»
There is a men working hard at the door to call us to enjoy the burgers. After a couple days passing buy the door and getting invited by him, I gave a try. OMG what a great decision! The waitress was very kind, food was delicious, very clean and the atmosphere is so familiar. I love it â¤ï¸

Arrived as a party of 6 to celebrate a colleague's birthday.  Was able to get a table in the back without a problem.  Nice, bright, and spacious. The service was great and attentive.  Plenty of beer options. Opted for the lunch special. The burger seemed small & came with fries, probably 1/4 pound precooked but it was still very tasty.  Everyone in the group was satisfied.

It was really delicious!
I had a gluten-free plant-based burger and I am very impressed. The selection is huge, there's something for every preference, especially for allergy sufferers like me.
Totally friendly staff!
I would come here again!

The Loaded Fries were Amazing. I ordered the crispy chicken sandwich,  but it was not what what I was expecting,  so they kindly switched it out with the Beef Burger which was Delicious. Great staff, very friendly.

Great place! The burgers are incredibly juicy and delicious, and the buns are fresh. The atmosphere is cozy, the staff is friendly, and the service is quick. Iâ€™ll definitely be back and highly recommend it to everyone!

DoskonaÅ‚e hamburgery, idealne frytki, pyszna domowa lemoniada, pikle smakowaÅ‚y jak domowe ze sÅ‚oika od babci. Produkty najwyÅ¼szej jakoÅ›ci, z ekologicznych dostaw. ObsÅ‚uga bardzo sympatyczna i komunikatywna, uciÄ™liÅ›my sobie pogawÄ™dkÄ™ na temat pochodzenia produktÃ³w w restauracji. Miejsce bardzo klimatyczne, typowy amerykaÅ„ski klimat. Bardzo blisko WTC, w sercu Manhattanu a mimo to ceny przystÄ™pne. Polecam.

Pretty good burgers and seem to be a healthier and use more mindful products. A bit pricey, but as most of the healthy things in this country, you end up paying more, because most of the time unhealthy=cheap, healthy=expensive.

service was amazing, they were respectful and knew everything about the menu, making it easy to navigate when asked questions about it. the food came out quickly, and even the single serve appetizers were filling. me and my friend came, very impressed, would recommend to eat at if youâ€™re in the area.

Unâ€™ottima scoperta nel cuore di New York! Gli hamburger sono davvero buoni, preparati con ingredienti di qualitÃ  e grande attenzione. Si sente la differenza.

Un grandissimo punto a favore Ã¨ il personale: gentilissimi e simpatici, davvero sopra la media. Un ringraziamento speciale a Diana, che ci ha servito con una disponibilitÃ  rara: ci ha aiutato nella scelta dei panini e ci ha seguiti con attenzione e gentilezza per tutta la durata del pasto.

Il locale Ã¨ piacevole e ben curato, perfetto per una cena tra amici. Il prezzo Ã¨ coerente con la media di New York: noi abbiamo speso circa 130$ in 5, e ne Ã¨ valsa assolutamente la pena.

Consigliatissimo!

We were seated as soon as we arrived. It is a spacious dining area, service remembered us from a previous visit. They are extremely friendly and helpful. Food came out quickly and was as ordered. Payment was also quick. We will 100 percent return.

I came with my family. Amazing food and great staff. Speedy service. All around great place to visit. Our waitress Sam was amazing and attentive. Each of us tried a different burger and had an order of fries and onion rings. The drinks were amazing. The Rum Punch was like an island in a glass. The Classic Margarita was made with love. Give it a try!
This place abuses customers. I left a small tip for a pickup order and both my burgers were just patties with buns. Donâ€™t order from this nasty place!

Excelente restaurante! Comimos las hamburguesas de carne de bisonte, sÃºper deliciosas! Para compartir mitad aros de cebolla y patatas dulces, tambiÃ©n riquÃ­simas. De postre unos batidos que estaban espectaculares. El servicio rÃ¡pido y muy amable con especial menciÃ³n a Adriana que fue nuestra camarera y estuvo muy atenta en todo momento. Imprescindible si visitas o estÃ¡s en NY!

Burger Village is a great place with a wide array of choices, including a special focus on Vegan and Vegetarian options.
Their Cauliflower tenders were incredibly crispy with the tangy dipping sauce adding a burst of flavors to each bite.
Tomato soup was a classic, it had comforting homemade taste, creamy, rich and perfectly seasoned.
We tried the Village Veggie Burger and the Spicy Vegan - Signature pair. The Burger was nice, the toppings and sauces complimented it. Cocktail and Shakes' options were great too.
Our experience was elevated by the exceptional service. The staff was very courteous and polite.

In conclusion, Burger Village is a must visit for Burger enthusiasts and those looking for diverse options. Don't miss their array of innovative burgers, beverages and scrumptious sides to compliment your meal

Great location, amazing staff and super delicious food. Couldnâ€™t recommend more. â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸

Unfortunately I have the name memory of a goldfish (sorry! ğŸ«£). The young woman with the cute beanie recommended me a great combination of toppings for my bison-burger. Which, in combination with the giant portion of waffle-fries, was too much for my big appetite.
The burger was perfectly cooked and the waffle friesâ€¦ ğŸ¤¤ Iâ€™ll 100% visit again, when Iâ€™m in NY again.
